name: The Padre
detailed_description:
Enter The Haunted Mansion of The Padre, a retro-new 3D horror adventure game, with a wicked sense of humor and striking atmosphere. Solve challenging puzzles, hunt down horrors never-seen-before and discover the hidden past of the main character and the world around him. Survive on mysterious dual planes of existence and use all your brain power and brawn to fend of evil with the most badass priest in the history of gaming.

KEY FEATURES

  • ADVENTURE AND SURVIVE IN A UNIQUE 3D PIXEL ART WORLD

    Use your brain … or your gun to solve problems
  • FIND YOUR WAY IN A HIGHLY DETAILED AND INTERACTIVE ENVIRONMENT

    Anything and everything can be your undoing
  • SOLVE MECHANICAL PUZZLES

    Twist your brain to crack the code of one-of-a-kind puzzles
  • EXPERIENCE A HAUNTED ATMOSPHERE

    Marvel at stunning handcrafted areas
  • FIND ALL THE EASTER EGGS AND HIDDEN REFERENCES[/list]
    Guess what?! We will not add a picture here to spoil the fun, but REMEMBER: “It is dangerous to go alone!”

    WHAT’S THE STORY BEHIND THE HAUNTED MANSION

    You are the Padre! A fearless defender of the faith. A veteran daemon hunter, his guns loaded with cold lead, his mouth full with cynical comments. Your old mentor, Benedictus, has disappeared. His name alone surfaces molten-hot hatred in your soul. He would be better missing for good, but who are you to disobey the Lord? As you begin your quest, you search for a man of the cloth, but you know from the beginning that the Lord will not let you pass on this one. You are destined to lose, to fail. Faith will drive you where you have to be to stop the tide of evil once again, but your old body may not survive this final ordeal. Only God can tell.

    LANGUAGES

    The Padre is now available in English, but the final version will contain options for French, German, Spanish, Russian and Italian.

short_description: A Suspenseful 3D Survival-Horror Adventure Featuring Old-School Narrative Storytelling, Filled with Humor and Horror Game and Movie References.
reviews:
“The Padre is animated using a voxel art style, aiming to give the game a blocky, surreal appearance as players face down quivering creatures and presences that will whittle down the mind.”
Siliconera

“A fabulously freaky voxel based point and click survival horror with a healthy dose of dark humor.”
Alpha Beta Gamer

“A voxel tribute to the old horror adventure games”
IndieWatch
